articles.title: Ben Ferencz: Last surviving Nuremberg prosecutor dies, aged 103 - BBC
articles.description: Ben Ferencz was just 27 when he convicted 22 Nazi officials for war crimes and crimes against humanity.
articles.content:
The last surviving prosecutor from the post-World War Two Nuremberg trials has died aged 103.
